The identification of the person who att: The expert's verdict mentions that Tarun Gajjar was identified as the person who attacked Hardik Patel at the rally in Surendranagar, Gujarat. This identification helps verify the authenticity of the claim.
Verification of the images: The expert's verdict states that a Facebook page shared a collage of two pictures featuring Rahul Gandhi and Hardik Patel. The expert conducted a Google reverse image search and found no results, indicating that the image was not authentic. This verification helps debunk the claim.
Examination of the background of individ: The expert's verdict mentions that the lady standing behind Rahul Gandhi and the unidentified person in the image is Rita Bahuguna Joshi, a former Congress leader who joined BJP in 2016. By examining the background of the individuals in the image, the expert was able to determine that the claim was misleading.
Confirmation from media reports: The expert's verdict mentions that media reports confirmed that the person who attacked Hardik Patel was Tarun Gajjar. This confirmation from media reports adds credibility to the authenticity of the claim.
